Other Information

Category (Hangar)

Regional

Manufacturer

Airbus

The Airbus A318 is the smallest variant of the A320 family, at just 132 seats.

Trivia

  • This plane can perform steep approaches at 5.5° (normally it would be 3°), allowing it to land at airports like London City Airport.
  • The range for this plane is the second longest in the family, only being beat by the A320neoXLR.
